name: mongoosesetuppractice
description: # from terminal:  - npm init -y  - touch index.js - npm i express mongoose dotenv (can do all in one line) - go to package.json - set "type": "module", underneath "main": "index.js", - this allows us to use es6 and use import/export  - import express in index.js  - create app - const app = express() - create port variable - const port = 8080 - create route -    app.get('/', req, res ) - add app.listen route to server
